title: Beauty from Love
description: The epic love story between an all-American beauty and her Aussie billionaire reaches its passionate conclusion in the final installment of The Beauty Series.Jack McLachlan finally has the life he’s always wanted. With Laurelyn Prescott by his side, he’s discovered a love that’s all-consuming and a happiness he never thought he’d find. But their perfect world is shaken when the shadows of Jack’s past return to threaten their future.Determined to protect Laurelyn, Jack tries to keep her safe from the secrets and sins of his former life. But some wounds run deep, and not even their love is immune to the fallout. As they face challenges neither of them saw coming, Jack and Laurelyn must fight for the life—and the forever—they’ve built together.
author: Georgia Cates
